nodes.text: Gaber Rollobad was a Sullustan male smuggler who owned the YT-1210 light freighter Boolarg.

On a gun-run, Rollobad was shot down over Corellia by the Star Destroyer Shrike and crashed his escape pod near the Boolarg. He attempted to enlist the aid of freelancers to recover the weapons shipment, which was hidden in a compartment onboard his vessel, but was caught by Imperial officials in the process.
